activities: LiveOffice provides managed email archiving, email compliance, email discovery, email continuity, financial websites and Exchange hosting solutions.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: LiveOffice encourages interested persons to raise any concerns using the contact information provided (privacy@liveoffice.com) and the Company will investigate and attempt to resolve any complaints and disputes regarding use and disclosure of information in accordance with the Safe Harbor Principles.  If a complaint or dispute cannot be resolved through LiveOffice’s internal process, the Company agrees to dispute resolution using an independent resource mechanism (a third party resolution provider).  BBB EU Safe Harbor Program for dispute resolution.
